name: Final Frontier (itch) (Team Undesirables)
description:
Final Frontier is a small game project made by Full Sail University students for their Game Design Bachelor's capstone project.

On a foreign planet, a community of opportunists have founded a moderately-sized colony. They have employed you, a genetically enhanced soldier, as security from any hostiles. Unfortunately, your skills are needed as a group of hostile aliens have besieged the base and are invading many of the installations. It is up to you to repel the attacking forces and save what is left of this prospective colony.

The player is a space colonist fighting off invaders from their home base. They will be progressing by utilizing abilities and shooting their way through enemies with guns and disabling power generators. They’ll be fighting their way through different environments of the base, including the training facility, communications bay, power generation center, and a horticulture lab.

Designers:
Jonathan Angulo
Jacob Arnold
Justin Butler
Wyatt Curtiss

Artists:
James Lucido
Michelle Guerrero
